headline: Apple & Nike Bounce on China Tariff News: A Closer Look
summary: In a big de-escalation of recent trade tensions, the US and China have recently agreed to a 90-day truce that significantly lowers tariffs on hundreds of billions of dollars in goods. Apple and Nike shares found much-needed relief on the news.

raw.headline: Apple & Nike Bounce on China Tariff News: A Closer Look
raw.summary: In a big de-escalation of recent trade tensions, the US and China have recently agreed to a 90-day truce that significantly lowers tariffs on hundreds of billions of dollars in goods. Apple and Nike shares found much-needed relief on the news.

headline: Phil Knight says he's no longer interested in buying the Portland Trail Blazers
summary: PORTLAND, Ore. — Nike co-founder Phil Knight said Wednesday he is not interested in buying the Portland Trail Blazers, who are up for sale. Paul Allen’s estate said Tuesday it has begun...

headline: Retail stocks are still at risk with potential tariff-driven price hikes on the horizon
